topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP

name: LinuXchangE
short_description: LinuXchangE pretends to be a replacemnt for Microsoft Windows servers by offering services like PDC, DNS, WINS, E-mail (with Relay access, no SPAM), Directory Contact and some colaborative tools.  It stores all it's information usin LDAP like ActiveDirec
